title: Pay Period
description: An object representing a two week pay period with an array of shifts worked during the period

start.description: The first date of the pay period

end.description: The last date of the pay period

hours.description: The total hours worked this pay period

pay.description: The total amount earned this pay period

shifts.description: An array of objects representing shifts worked

items.description: An object representing a shift worked in RIT Dining

hourly.description: The amount paid per hour of work for this shift
